00018 #ifndef __CNAMEDOBJECT_H
00019 #define __CNAMEDOBJECT_H
00020 
00021 #include <typeinfo>
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include "simkerneldefs.h"
00024 #include "simutil.h"
00025 #include "cobject.h"
00026 #include "cexception.h"
00027 #include "cstringpool.h"

00029 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00030 
00031 
00038 class SIM_API cNamedObject : public cObject
00039 {
00040   private:
00041     const char *namep;  // object name (stringpooled if flags&FL_NAMEPOOLING!=0)
00042 
00043   protected:
00044     unsigned short flags;  // FL_NAMEPOOLING flag; other bits used by derived classes
00045     unsigned short unused; // space lost to due to word aligment; one may make use of it in subclasses (cModule, cSimpleModule, cGate)
00046     enum {FL_NAMEPOOLING = 1};
00047 
00048   protected:
00049     // internal: set a bit in flags; flag is one of the FL_xxx constants
00050     void setFlag(int flag, bool value) {if (value) flags|=flag; else flags&=~flag;}
00051 
00052   private:
00053     // pool for shared storage of object names
00054     static cStringPool stringPool;
00055 
00056   public:
00062     cNamedObject();
00063 
00067     explicit cNamedObject(const char *name, bool namepooling=true);
00068 
00073     cNamedObject(const cNamedObject& obj);
00074 
00078     virtual ~cNamedObject();
00079 
00088     cNamedObject& operator=(const cNamedObject& o);
00089 
00090     // Note: dup() is still the original cObject one, which throws an error
00091     // to indicate that dup() has to be redefined in each subclass.
00092 
00096     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00097 
00101     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00103 
00111     virtual void setName(const char *s);
00112 
00117     virtual const char *getName() const  {return namep ? namep : "";}
00118 
00123     virtual void setNamePooling(bool b);
00124 
00128     virtual bool getNamePooling() {return flags&FL_NAMEPOOLING;}
00130 };
00131 
00132 NAMESPACE_END
00133
